Package com.github.egyptian_league.json.src

Class JsonSerializerOptions

java.lang.Object
com.github.egyptian_league.json.src.JsonSerializerOptions
public class JsonSerializerOptions extends Object
JSON serialization options to modify the default serializer behavior. Also allows for custom converters to be add.

    • DefaultOptions

      public static final JsonSerializerOptions DefaultOptions
      Default options instance.

    • MaxDepth

      public int MaxDepth
      Sets Max JSON recursion depth. (default: 65)

    • TabWidth

      public int TabWidth
      Sets JSON output tab width. (default: 2)

    • WriteIndented

      public boolean WriteIndented
      Enables formatted JSON output. (default: false)

      Returns true if a suitable converter is found
      Parameters:

      true if a suitable converter is found

      public JsonConverter getConverter(Type typeToConvert)
      Returns typeToConvert converter.
      Parameters:
      typeToConvert - type whose associated converter is to be returned
      Returns:
      typeToConvert converter

    • addConverter

      public boolean addConverter(Class<?> converterType, JsonConverter converter)
      Maps a specific converter to a specific type.

      Returns true if type is not mapped; otherwise, returns false.

      Parameters:
      converterType - converter type
      converter - converter instance
      Returns:
      true if type is not mapped; otherwise, returns false

    • removeConverter

      public void removeConverter(Class<?> converterType)
      Removes the type and its corresponding converter. This method does nothing if the key does not exist.
      Parameters:
      converterType - the type that needs to be removed
